summary: This is a brief email exchange from December 2018 discussing lawmakers calling on the Department of Justice to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes a link to a news article on the topic and suggests a meeting to discuss the matter.

events.title: Lawmakers call for DOJ probe into Epstein NPA
events.description: Various lawmakers are calling on the Department of Justice to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement given to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: In December 2018, lawmakers were publicly demanding an explanation from the DOJ regarding Jeffrey Epstein's Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).
The email references a specific NBC News article detailing these calls for a probe into Epstein's 'sweetheart deal'.
The correspondence suggests a planned discussion about the political and legal fallout surrounding the Epstein case.
